19.8. Multi-headed CNN Model 385
Figure 19.3: Line Plot of RMSE per Day for a Multi-channel CNN with 14-day Inputs.
19.8 Multi-headed CNN Model
We can further extend the CNN model to have a separate sub-CNN model or head for each input
variable, which we can refer to as a multi-headed CNN model. This requires a modiﬁcation to
the preparation of the model, and in turn, modiﬁcation to the preparation of the training and
